Posts.Content: Mar 3, 2009 07:39AM grannyg48 wrote: I can't help either one of you because there is alot I don't know yet my lumpectomy is for March 11th and depending what they find it just may be a mastectomy. I am scared to death and I am 60 years old and never thought this would happen to me there is no history of cancer in my family and now I have to worry about my 3 daughters. I am having a hard time trying to wrap my mind around this I just hope it hasn't spread. This desease is awful.
